column4: anyone have any suggestions as to where I could get different login window screens/themes?
I though there were some gdm themes in the repositories - just not installed by default you could get
you know what those packages might be called?
the bot just mentioned them -->  ubotu> Found: feisty-gdm-themes, gdm, blubuntu-gdm-theme, edgy-gdm-themes, gdm-themes (and 5 others)
